forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 12C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thunderstorms. Low 11C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thunderstorms. Low 52F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High around 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
